meanings.definition: The quality of having acquired knowledge or skill through study or experience.
meanings.sent1: Her learnedness in history impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: His learnedness in mathematics helped him solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: Despite his learnedness in cooking, he still managed to burn the toast.
meanings.sent4: Her learnedness in gardening bloomed like a beautiful flower in spring.
meanings.sent5: The learnedness of the ancient scholars was passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: The state of being educated or knowledgeable.
meanings.sent1: The professor's learnedness was evident in every lecture.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her learnedness by quoting famous authors.
meanings.sent3: His learnedness in trivia made him the champion of the game.
meanings.sent4: The learnedness of the wise owl guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The learnedness of the scientist led to groundbreaking discoveries.
